As one of the biggest employers in the Nordics, Poland and Estonia, you have excellent opportunities to evolve, develop and move forward with us.
   

  

 Studies show that members of underrepresented communities don’t apply for jobs unless they tick all the qualification boxes. If this is part of why you hesitate to apply, we would like you to reconsider and give it a chance. Maybe your profile fits our needs much better than you think.
   

  

**For candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
   

  

**For candidates in Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following:
   

  

 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp.
   

  

 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf.
   

  

 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Domänarkitekt IT - Gemensamma funktioner och finans
description:
Svenska kraftnät är en nyckelaktör i energiomställningen. Vår IT-division växer för att möjliggöra en fördubblad elproduktion och en fossilfri framtid. Med ny teknik ökar vi både infrastrukturens kapacitet och utvecklingstakten inom digitalisering och processer.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Svenska kraftnät är inne i en mycket utvecklande fas och behöver förstärka sin arkitekturfunktion med en Domänarkitekt IT för domänen Gemensamma funktioner och Finans. Du blir en del av IT-divisionen och kommer tillsammans med Gemensamma funktioner och Finans vara med och driva den pågående digitaliseringsresan.
   

  

 Domänens ansvarsområde är brett och handlar i huvudsak om att skapa och utveckla förutsättningar för att alla på Svenska kraftnät ska kunna göra ett bra jobb. Domänen håller ihop områden som berör hela myndigheten genom att ansvara för övergripande styrningsfrågor och ge stöd till hela verksamheten inom områdena ekonomi, HR, inköp, kommunikation, juridik, fastighet, elberedskap och säkerhet samt hållbarhet.
   

  

 I rollen som Domänarkitekt IT arbetar du på strategisk/taktisk nivå och fungerar som brygga mellan verksamhet och IT. I dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter ingår att:
   

  

* Ansvara för framtagning av målbilder, strategier, målarkitekturer och färdplaner inom domänen samt bidra till effektiv portfölj- och förvaltningsstyrning.
+ Guida lösningar inom projekt och förvaltning mot beslutade målbilder, strategier, målarkitekturer och färdplaner.

* Spela en central roll i framtagande och genomförande av utvecklingsplaner för portfölj och förvaltning samt beskriva och kommunicera arkitekturen till aktuella målgrupper.
+ Delta i olika samarbetsgrupper för; coachning och granskning av lösningar, arkitekturstyrning, utveckling av arkitekturramverk, etc.
+ Bidra till strategisk planering samt stötta strategiska digitaliseringsinitiativ.
+ Ta fram strategiska och taktiska beslutsunderlag.
+ Facilitera workshops och utbildningar.
+ Planera och följa upp leveranser i projekt och förvaltning.
+ Ansvara för att bedöma behovet av arkitekturstöd inom domänen och stötta i resursförsörjning och allokering för verksamheten.

* Samordna och coacha lösningsarkitekter inom domänen samt leda och driva relaterade lösningsdiskussioner.
+ Coachning av kollegor och konsulter inom IT-divisionen.

* Öka förståelsen och löpande bidra till kompetensutveckling och omvärldsbevakning inom ditt område.


 Som Domänarkitekt IT tillhör du avdelningen Verksamhets- och IT-utvecklingsstöd, som ingår i IT-divisionen. I ditt dagliga arbete har du ett nära samarbete med verksamhetsarkitekter, lösningsarkitekter, representanter för projekt och förvaltningsobjekt samt kollegor inom arkitekturfunktionen.
   

  

**Om dig**
**Skallkrav**
 Vi söker dig som är trygg i din kompetens och har ett samarbetsinriktat förhållningssätt. Med en stark kommunikativ förmåga skapar du förtroende och driver arbetet framåt i en komplex och föränderlig miljö. Du är analytisk och har lätt för att se helheten, skapa sammanhang och navigera mellan verksamhet och IT. Rollen kräver självledarskap, lyhördhet och förmåga att hantera parallella uppgifter och göra avvägda prioriteringar.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Vidare har du högskole-/universitetsutbildning inom ett relevant tekniskt område alternativt gedigen bakgrund inom IT-arkitektur och verksamhetsarkitektur förvärvad genom arbetslivserfarenhet. Du har även:
   

  

* Flerårig aktuell och relevant arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med IT-arkitektur och verksamhetsarkitektur i enlighet med etablerade arkitekturmetoder, verktyg och processer.
* Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med etablering av IT-lösningar i komplexa miljöer.
* Erfarenhet av att självständigt skapa och förankra målbilder och färdplaner.
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.


 Vi ser det som
 **meriterande** 
 om du har:
   

  

* Certifiering inom IT-arkitektur eller annat relevant arkitekturområde.
* Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med information och processer relaterat till underhåll och förvaltning av fysiska tillgångar, samhällsinfrastruktur som till exempel elnät, telekom eller fastigheter under de senaste 10 åren.
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av införande av affärssystem.
* Arbetat med IT-säkerhet inom en samhällskritisk verksamhet alternativt verksamhet med mycket höga säkerhetskrav.
* Erfarenhet av modelleringsverktyg till exempel Sparx EA.


**Bra att veta**
* Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm / Sundbyberg.
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Sista ansökningsdag 2025-08-20, vi använder urvalsfrågor istället för personligt brev.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning.
* Tester kan förekomma i rekryteringsprocessen.
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Experis.
 **Vill du veta mer** 
 , kontakta gärna rekryteringskonsult Anki Snis, tel. nr. 0703-775969 eller via e-post: anki.snis@se.experis.com alternativt Maria Sahlén rekryterare hos Svenska kraftnät, maria.sahlen2@svk.se, 010-489 20 27.
   

  

 Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim ST, 010 475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Tjänsteägare Private Cloud
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Har du ett skarpt öga för Cloud-tjänster och IT-infrastruktur? Vill du vara en nyckelspelare som arbetar nära affären men samtidigt behålla en fot i tekniken? Mitt namn är Tony Granda och jag ansvarar för vår gruppering inom Cloud/Hybrid-IT på Telia Cygate. Jag söker just nu en Tjänsteägare inom Private Cloud till mitt team, kanske är du vår nya kollega?
   

  

**Är det här din nästa möjlighet?**
 I rollen som Tjänsteägare inom Private Cloud kommer du att äga och förvalta våra managerade tjänster av våra cloud lösningar som riktar sig mot våra kunder. I rollen arbetar du i gränslandet mellan våra affärsägare, levererande kundteam och tekniker med att säkerställa av våra tjänster uppfyller krav på kvalitet, lönsamhet, skalbarhet och effektivitet.
   

  

 Rollen som Tjänsteägare innebär stor variation i arbetsuppgifter där du får sätta din egen prägel på hur vi arbetar med och levererar Cloud-tjänster.
   

  

 Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Arbete med att utveckla rutiner, processer och förvaltningsplaner för våra levererande team
* Besluta om tekniska vägval och design avseende våra tjänster
* Utföra omvärldsbevakning av teknikområdet för att säkerställa att vi erbjuder tjänster som kunderna vill ha
* Stötta sälj i pågående dialoger avseende driftavtal
* Ansvara för prognos och budget


**Är det här du?**
 För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har arbetat hands-on med teknik inom Cloud/Hybrid-IT och delar vår passion för att skapa kundnytta. Du har kunskap inom Managerade Tjänster och hur de är sammansatta, samt har en förmåga att förstå och sätta dig in i kundens verksamhet, syfte, behov, mål och strategier för att ta fram den bästa lösningen. Du är kommunikativ och affärsmässig och dina idéer kan du kommunicera till olika typer av stakeholders. Du kan ta ett kommersiellt ansvar för din tjänst och kan för den dialog med kund som krävs för att komma framåt i våra kunders digitala resa.
   

  

 Du behöver vara svensk medborgare och flytande kunskaper och språk i Svenska är ett krav.
   

  

**Varför Telia Cygate?**
 På Telia Cygate är vi inte bara experter på nätverk, säkerhet och olika slags moln – vi är också ett gäng som tycker att det ska vara kul att gå till jobbet! Som en del av Telia Company har vi styrkan att skapa verklig påverkan i stor skala, bidra till samhällsnytta och hjälpa våra kunder att navigera i digitaliseringens värld. Vi gör det alltid med värme, omtanke och ett leende. Här är det idéerna och våra olika perspektiv som gör oss starka, och tillsammans ser vi till att teknikens värld blir en plats där alla trivs – och där du hör hemma.
   

  

 Hos oss är din utveckling viktig. Vi uppmuntrar till kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och ser till att just du och dina intressen är i fokus. Vi vet att det är människorna som utgör vårt företag, och därför värdesätter vi glädje, kreativitet och olika perspektiv i allt vi gör.
   

  

 Välkommen att växa tillsammans med oss, där vi gör teknik mänsklig och skapar verklig påverkan
 **!**
**Låter det intressant? Ansök idag!**
 Ta chansen och bli en del av vårt härliga team! Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig.
   

  

 Placeringsort: Stockholm, Malmö, Göteborg, Karlstad
   

  

 Om du har några frågor gällande den här specifika tjänsten så får du gärna kontakta Talent Acquisition Specialist Josefin Persson Ståhl på josefin.persson-stahl@teliacompany.com eller via LinkedIn. Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-08-17, men vi rekryterar löpande, så vänta inte för länge!
   

  

 Bakgrundskontroll är en del i våra rekryteringsprocesser.
   

  

**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Lead Consultant, Telecom Business - Tietoevry Tech Services Sweden (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Would you like to join a community where you will work with the latest technology and where you can grow your competence in a systematic manner? Would you also like to have flexibility in your work and working hours, and do you have experience in transformation projects? Then this is the place for you!
   

  

 Tietoevry Tech Services is thrilled to embark on an exciting journey under new ownership. This change opens up new possibilities, challenges, and growth opportunities for our company and our employees. We are looking for talented people who want to join us on this exciting journey and help shape the digital landscape in the Nordics.
   

  

 Within the Telecom segment, we are implementing a renewed strategy to better meet our customers’ demand and scale our solutions. To successfully execute the strategy, we aim to expand the customer team with senior colleagues with experience from Telecom domain, who thrive in the intersection of consulting and contributing to business growth in close collaboration with sales and delivery teams. It is not important what your exact previous roles and titles have been, we are searching for the right person.
   

  

**When joining Tietoevry Tech Services as a Lead Consultant, Telecom Business:**
 In this position there are two main directions which you would focus on:
   

  

* Business and technology consulting: In this direction, you would be working closely with our Telecom customers in business, IT or network area together with Tietoevry Tech Services colleagues to reach customer business goals, improve IT architecture or develop technical solutions utilizing modern technologies, tools and services.
* Driving growth: In this direction, you will be working with a dedicated customer team to bring your experience, expert guidance and ideas on how to grow our footprint in existing and new Telecom customers in the best possible way. You will also be able to analyse existing solutions and find potential improvements and turn those into new business opportunities. You will have the mandate to drive your own initiatives and be a key contributor in various sales cases including RFx processes.


**We Believe You Have**
* A track-record and interest in successful IT consulting, and architecture engagements with large-scale customers. Ideally, your experience spans both continuous application services and transformation projects, perhaps from a “Big 5” firm.
* Several years of experience in Telecom including domain specific IT (BSS/OSS) and being familiar with e.g. TM Forum Open Digital Architecture (ODA).
* Strong business acumen and enjoy business development and sales, being result oriented and demonstrate accountability, commitment and customer centricity. You are comfortable in a customer-facing role with the ability to create well-crafted material and present your ideas to strategic customer stakeholders.
* Excellent understanding of agile ways of working, including Scaled Agile Framework. In SAFe, you understand the architectural vision as part of the business and how the organization works together to produce great solutions. Holding certifications is a plus.
* Hands-on experience with AI, ML, GenAI as several customers of ours have started their AI / GenAI journey.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to work collaboratively across teams both internally and externally.


**It Is Great If You Also Have**
* A willingness to stay up to date with the latest trends and developments in IT & Telecom technology space, including infrastructure and platforms.
* Understanding of cybersecurity principles, standards, and best practices.
* Previous experience in and/or enthusiasm towards data and cloud architecture and know how to leverage Azure, GCP or AWS.
* Besides being fluent in English, it is beneficial if you also speak one Nordic language.


**Did we get you inspired?**
 We look forward to your application! Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we will reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact hiring manager Leo West, leo.west@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

 We perform background checks on all final candidates.
   

  

 Tietoevry Tech Services declines calls from recruitment companies.
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Motion Graphic Designer (Fixed-Term Contract)
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds – from live sports, movies and series to music and original shows. Our world class sports-rights portfolio is unparalleled and includes the UEFA Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, Nations League, Premier League, Bundesliga, FIS Winter Sports and Formula 1, just to name a few.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, Viaplay Group Sport are searching for a
 **Motion Graphic Designer** 
 to join our cutting-edge creative Look & Feel Team. The Look & Feel team consists of a group of passionate, creative professionals who pride themselves on delivering high quality sports graphics and visual assets for over 50.000 hours of live sport every year.
   

  

*This position is a
 **fixed-term contract for one year** 
 (with the possibility of extension), based at our headquarters in Stockholm or Copenhagen.*
 The role
   

  

 Our Motion Graphic Designers are an integral part of every stage of the creative Look & Feel process, collaborating with our team of visual directors and editorial sport teams on a wide range of projects. From launching a new graphics package for one of our multinational sports rights and creating title sequences to telling a local story with motion graphics.
   

  

**What will you do?**
* Use illustrative, sound, visual and multimedia effects to tell stories.
* Be able to prioritize workload and respond well under pressure.
* Develop stunning graphic assets for our world class sports broadcasts.
* Work independently or as part of a large team depending on the project.
* Brainstorm and pitch ideas to our visual directors and editorial team.
* Receive a creative brief and deliver stunning results under tight deadlines


 What we’re looking for
   

  

 We are after a designer who understands the look, feel and physics of motion. A designer who can execute projects from the initial idea all the way to final production. This is a fantastic role for someone looking to work for a fast paced, successful and expanding international organization working with world class sports. In order to thrive in this role, we do believe you’ll have at least some experience in the following:
   

  

* Degree level or equivalent experience in Design, Motion and Animation.
* Advanced user of Photoshop/After Effects/plugins/CS.
* Proficiency with Adobe Illustrator, Premiere Pro & Cinema 4D preferred but not required
* Have exceptional design, animation and typographical skills.
* Proficient with the Microsoft Office Suite
* Fluent in English. Fluency or proficiency in Danish or Swedish is a major plus, but not necessary if you are the right candidate.


**Who are you?**
* Highly self-motivated and responsible.
* A conceptual thinker with the confidence to be able to pitch ideas both to the team and editorial departments.
* Able to prioritize workload and respond well under pressure.
* Strong communicator with great people skills.
* Excellent concept development skills.
* Have previous industry experience as a motion designer
* You take pride in the work you produce, and you view every task as an opportunity to shine
* You consider design problems as opportunities to finding solutions


**Please note:** 
 A showreel that showcases your talent in motion design and animation must be included with your application. Submissions that do NOT include a showreel will not be considered.
   

  

 What we offer you
   

  

 We are a company that prioritizes people over everything else — from every single employee to every single one of our millions of customers. What unites us all at Viaplay Group is our passion to create meaningful moments and evoke emotions with our content.
   

  

 We achieve these by going through our day to day processes abiding by our company values:
 **Bold** 
 ,
 **Engaging** 
 ,
 **Smart** 
 and
 **Curious** 
 .
   

  

 With them, we can create the future we want to experience. Together we can make the right decisions - the decisions that helps us achieve the company's vision and goals.
   

  

 Hit play today
   

  

 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Sr. Solutions Consultant
description:
**Hiring Manager:** 
 Nadine Asselin
   

  

**Talent Acquisition Advisor:** 
 Jess Moore
   

  

**Job Code Level:** 
 REP3
   

  

 Refer Your Friends!
   

  

**AI-First. Future-Driven. Human-Centered.**
 At OpenText, AI is at the heart of everything we do—powering innovation, transforming work, and empowering digital knowledge workers. We're hiring talent that AI can't replace to help us shape the future of information management. Join us.
   

  

**Business Network Cloud**
 OpenText Business Network Cloud provides B2B integration solutions that help securely connect internal and external data teams, systems, and applications. Business Network Cloud supply chain solutions offer frictionless information exchange, end-to-end visibility and extensive collaboration with a single digital backbone across business ecosystems. Our global sales team at OpenText Business Network works with customers and organizations of all sizes with scalable B2B integration and secure supply chain solutions to support the ever-changing needs of today’s dynamic business environment.
   

  

**Your Impact**
 As a Solutions Consultant, You'll Serve As a Trusted Advisor To Our Enterprise Customers, Supporting Their Digital Transformation With Strategic, Technically Sound Solutions. You Will
   

  

* Support the Sales team in positioning and expanding the OpenText Business Network portfolio.
* Lead solution design, technical qualification, and proposal development for B2B and A2A integration opportunities.
* Uncover business challenges and consult on process improvement through discovery, analysis, and stakeholder engagement.
* Design and present compelling solutions aligned to customer objectives, demonstrating ROI and business value.
* Collaborate closely with internal teams—Product Management, Architecture, and Delivery—to ensure a smooth handover from sales to implementation.
* Deliver engaging presentations and RFP responses tailored to both technical and executive audiences.
* Provide technical guidance during proof-of-concepts and customer evaluations.
* Act as a subject matter expert in integration strategy, secure data exchange, and digital supply chain modernization.


**What The Role Offers**
* A consultative, customer-facing role where your technical and strategic expertise will drive digital transformation.
* The opportunity to shape and deliver high-impact B2B integration solutions across industries such as retail, automotive, high tech, life sciences, and manufacturing.
* A collaborative environment where innovation, curiosity, and initiative are valued.
* Ownership of the solution design process, with the autonomy to architect the right outcomes.
* The chance to work across a broad portfolio of technologies in a cloud-first, integration-centric space.
* Occasional travel (10–15%) across Central Europe to connect with customers and colleagues.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Minimum 5 years of experience in a pre-sales, consulting, or delivery role focused on B2B/A2A services.
* Strong understanding of B2B integration, electronic exchanges, and supply chain business processes.
* Familiarity with ERP systems and integrations (SAP, Oracle, Microsoft, Infor), both on-premises and cloud-based.
* Proven experience designing B2B exchange models including e-invoicing and hybrid integration patterns.
* Confidence working with stakeholders from operational teams to C-level executives.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with fluency in German and English (French or Spanish a plus).
* Ability to craft strong business cases and demonstrate value through clear, data-driven proposals.
* Knowledge of global service models, SLAs, and change management processes.
* A collaborative team mindset and comfort working independently in a virtual role.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, Data Science, or equivalent experience.


**One Last Thing**
 OpenText is more than just a corporation, it's a global community where trust is foundational, the bar is raised, and outcomes are owned. As an Open Text Account Executive, you drive digital transformation for global clients, solving complex business challenges and accelerating their journey to the cloud. Your consultative expertise and success in complex sales cycles contribute directly to business growth, earning you a competitive compensation package that recognizes your substantial impact in shaping the digital enterprise landscape.
   

  

 OpenText's efforts to build an inclusive work environment go beyond simply complying with applicable laws. Our Employment Equity and Diversity Policy provides direction on maintaining a working environment that is inclusive of everyone, regardless of culture, national origin, race, color, gender, gender identification, sexual orientation, family status, age, veteran status, disability, religion, or other basis protected by applicable laws.
   

  

 If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or recruiting process, please contact us at hr@opentext.com. Our proactive approach fosters collaboration, innovation, and personal growth, enriching OpenText's vibrant workplace.

title: Thermal Interface Material Research engineer
company_industry: Telecommunications, Computers and Electronics Manufacturing, and Research Services
description:
**Thermal Interface Material Research engineer** 




  





 SRC MPE and Module Engineering lab is part of client's Sweden research center in Stockholm and is a highly creative, multidisciplinary and international think-tank, dedicated to exploration of innovative key technologies and turning them to working solutions.
 



 We are currently looking for a Thermal interface Materials (TIM) Research engineer to take on the challenge to explore, the future TIM solutions for our coming ICT concepts
 



  





 We expect this expert to be responsible for
 



 1) Giving technical and theoretical guidance for research on new TIM materials and their processes based on product demands and industry trends. This to achieve technical breakthroughs; especially in the areas of: overall conductivity, realiability and cost. .
 



 2) Supporting in the verification and test data analysis of key materials & processes: Including internal prototypes and samples or those obtained from cooperation with external partners.
 



 3) Supporting us in the build-up of an academic and industrial ecosystem/network, and providing scientific support and advice for the coming cooperation projects in this networkm including national , EU frameworks and other project calls.
 



 4) Supporting the build up a state of the art TIM-testing laboratory in our Stockholm office The work will be done from our material/thermal teams in Stockholm and our head office in China.
 



  





**Essential Skills required:** 




 We require a PhD
 



 -in the area of advanced materials, nanomaterials or materials chemistry with a focus to change/improve the basic functionality of the materials and/or their surfaces.
 



 Or
 



 -in the area of heat & mass transfer with a TIM related research focus
 



 We expect the candidate to have more than 1-2 years of post-doc experience of research and delevlopement within the area, preferably from industry
 



 This experience have given the candidate
 



 1. A good understanding of TIM; its R&D, its manufaturing process, its function including the interaction with surounding units/surfaces and the realibility of the total solutions.
 



 2. An excellent understanding of advanced material resources and trends in the material research industry, especially new innovative surface treatments and other ways to change/improve that basic functionality of materials and/or their surfaces
 



 The candidate can of course communicate fluently in English, both verbally and in writing
 



  





**Additional skills required:** 




 1. Excellent knowledge of general advanced material & processing.
 



 2. A solid knowledge of European universities or technology research organizations.
 



 3. We expect that the candidate can work independently as well as in a team
 



 4. The candidate should have a high focus on delivering high quality work
 



 5. Good communication skills are required
 



 6. Prior experience from international and multicultural work is preferred

title: Strategy Senior Manager to CS&G Sweden
description:
**Make a difference with us.**
 At
 **Accenture Strategy** 
 , you will develop and pursue brilliant ideas. You will work hand in hand with experts to explore new paths for companies, examine them from all angles, and integrate cutting-edge technologies into business strategies. With your expertise, you will give our clients a decisive competitive edge and lead companies successfully into the future.
   

  

 “Across the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.” –
 **Julie Sweet, Accenture CEO**
 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
   

  

 We are looking for a driven and ambitious
 **Strategy Manager or Senior Strategy Manager** 
 to our Corporate Strategy and Growth team in Nordics.
   

  

**Our Team**
 Corporate Strategy and Growth supports our clients in determining their next winning strategy by reimagining products, services revenue streams and pricing. We guide clients in accelerating their measurable and sustained growth through business unit and corporate strategies, go-to-market strategies, pricing strategies, digital strategies enabling growth, as well as growth-led turnarounds. Our projects cover a wide range of industries and clients.
   

  

 In our team, you will gain exposure to
   

  

  

- The most strategic challenges and opportunities that occupy the minds of industry leaders

- Cutting edge research and thought leadership that is defining the future of the industry

- Structured problem-solving techniques to enable our clients to transform their businesses

- A global network of highly skilled, geographically and culturally diverse people

- A world-class training curriculum that helps you continuously upskill

- A culture that encourages innovation, collaboration, enterprise, and a lot of fun

**The Role**
 As a
 **Strategy Manager or Senior Strategy Manager** 
 , you will be a part of a vibrant work environment where you will be responsible for solving complex problems, while constantly aspiring to develop your professional and interpersonal skills.
   

  

 In this role you will
   

  

  

- Develop and drive high-impact, strategic insights that solve complex business challenges for clients

- Lead and manage multidisciplinary project teams to deliver tailored strategic solutions

- Leverage deep industry knowledge and market trends to shape client strategies, ensuring long-term business success

- Cultivate strong client relationships, acting as a trusted advisor to senior executives, guiding them through pivotal decision-making processes

- Drive business development by identifying growth opportunities, contributing to sales efforts, and actively building and managing a strong sales pipeline

- Collaborate closely with internal teams across functions, fostering relationships that promote knowledge sharing and support for client delivery and growth

- Ensure the delivery of high-quality, data-driven recommendations that exceed client expectations and drive measurable results

**Qualifications**
- 6-10 years of experience in relevant industries, preferably with prior consulting experience and substantial expertise in strategy development and execution

- Access to established business network within selected industries

- Bachelor’s degree with a strong academic record. An advanced degree or MBA is a plus but not essential

- Deep functional knowledge in one or more of the following areas: Corporate strategy, operating model, data and analytics, digital marketing, route-to-market, revenue growth management, pricing or digital commerce

- Exceptional strategic thinking and problem-solving skills

- Team leadership experience

- Effective communication English skills, both written and oral

- An interest in technology and data

**The position will report to Finn-Erik Kolnes and** 
**workplace is** 
**Stockholm. Interested?**
 Apply online by attaching your CV, cover letter and educational diplomas.
   

  

 Due to the summer holiday season, our response times might be a bit longer than usual. Please note that we will review applications in the beginning of August and get back to you shortly after.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application. Thank you for your interest in joining Accenture.**
**About Accenture**
 Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services and solutions in strategy, consulting, digital, technology and operations. With more than 750,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture drives innovation to improve the way the world works and lives.
   

  

**Equal Employment Opportunity Statement**
 All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

title: Account Manager for Telco - Middle East
description:
Open source software is the new default in the enterprise, and Canonical is the new challenger to major enterprise software vendors.
   

  

 We deliver better open source from the data center to cloud and edge. Our Linux distribution Ubuntu is now the leading platform for public cloud compute, and the favorite platform for software engineers, data scientists and AI developers. Our mission is to accelerate the adoption and quality of open source globally, and our goal is to ship the most software on the planet by cores. A tidal wave of open source innovation is the next phase of the entire enterprise software industry, and we aim to be the most compelling way to ride that wave.
   

  

 Our customers include Global 500 enterprises and startups. We are expanding our product range from the base operating system - Ubuntu - to full enterprise solutions in infrastructure and applications. We can deliver software defined storage, private cloud solutions, container runtime environments, as well as databases, message queues, identity, observability, analytics, machine learning and web publishing capabilities. Customers love the idea that they can get security compliance and support for everything open source from a single company. Our goal is to have more solutions on tap than any other vendor, and we have built unique capabilities to make that possible across every cloud, every class of compute and every category of application.
   

  

 Canonical provides licensed enterprise software products, commercial support, managed services, consulting and training services to customers who are deploying Ubuntu or open source applications on the cloud, in their data center, or to the connected device and IoT ecosystem. We are just over 1,000 colleagues in 70+ countries and $250m in revenue, profitable, on a steady but relentless growth trajectory. We are almost entirely distributed, with leadership spread across many countries. We believe that talent is equally distributed across the globe, and we are excited to hire, develop, promote and ultimately trust a diverse group of exceptional leads to build the best, not biggest, enterprise software company.
   

  

 We hire carefully and deliberately; our selection process is long and requires substantial work from applicants. It will take successful applicants three to six months to secure an offer. This is not a place to apply if you are in a rush to find a position, it is a worthwhile place to apply if you are ambitious and long-term in your thinking about your career and the dynamics which move the world forward. If you see clearly the rise of open source, and you understand the drivers of enterprise procurement and technical decision making, then you will understand why Canonical has such a tremendous long term advantage. You will also understand, given the ferocity of competition and the challenges of competing in a market of giants, that we have to set a very high bar for hiring and performance. In order to be a world leading company we select for exceptional ability as well as character, and then provide an environment which promotes teamwork and celebrates diligence, collaboration and effectiveness. All of those are easy to say but hard to do - at Canonical we are willing to be uncomfortable in pursuit of that excellence.
   

  

 In building our sales team, we look for five things:
   

  

* Empathy for the customer - a real understanding of customer needs, industry-specific challenges, and a desire to help customers solve their business problems
* High intellect - the ability to learn quickly, understand very complex subjects, and communicate clearly to build trust and confidence
* Passion for technology - a fascination with the state of the art from brilliant people solving hard problems, and fierce competition for large prizes
* Teamwork - a willingness to help others, to collaborate well with people from different disciplines, and to balance personal and team ambitions
* Energy - the drive to motivate oneself and others to achieve the best result for the team and our customers


 Ubuntu is already very widely adopted, which gives us a credible basis for conversations in the market. Nevertheless, it requires real work for sales professionals to build on that adoption to create trusted and profitable commercial relationships with the enterprises in their territory. Our product managers and marketing teams run campaigns to generate awareness, engagement and leads, but you will need to go beyond managing inbound interest to develop the potential of your territory. You will need judgement as to which industries and companies are ready to go deeper with open source and Canonical, and energy to develop relationships in advance of proven interest. We expect professional practice, territory and account planning, as well as clear, complete and continuous reporting on pipeline status and activity, using standard professional tools.
   

  

 The successful candidate will carry an annual bookings quota within their assigned territory. They should be able to travel regionally for client engagement, industry conferences, and internationally for company events twice a year. They will be expected to demonstrate professionalism and effectiveness, to prospect accounts for new business, maintain and develop existing relationships, and work with colleagues and partners on account strategy. They must be comfortable selling enterprise software, open source, cloud, virtualization, container technologies and technical software solutions to senior levels of the enterprise.
   

  

 Location: This role can be based in EMEA and the assigned territory for this role is Middle East. Being based in this region is therefore preferable.
   

  

 What your day will look like
   

  

* Represent the company, its solutions and software, in your territory
* Build and execute a territory plan to prioritize outreach and prospecting
* Develop new pipeline through outreach, prospecting, local marketing, and industry events
* Close contracts to meet and exceed quarterly and annual bookings targets
* Be mindful and proactive in achieving tactical and strategic objectives
* Manage customer relationships and interactions through all stages of the sales cycle
* Work with field engineers to propose solutions that solve our customers' business problems
* Work with customer success to identify growth opportunities
* Maintain accurate pipeline data and forecasts within Salesforce
* Establish productive professional relationships with key influencers and decision makers


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Bachelor's level degree, preferably in engineering or computer science
* Experience of open source technology and solutions
* Detail oriented with effective follow-up
* Experience in enterprise software or technology sales planning and execution
* Knowledge of Telco market in the region: STC, Etisalat, Zain, Mobily ...
* Track record of achievement in sales targets and new account wins
* Self-discipline and motivation to be successful in a distributed team
* Professional written and spoken English, as well as any language that may be appropriate for your target market
* Ability to travel for customer engagements, industry events and company events


**Additional Skills Of Interest**
* Specific vertical experience, in particular finance, telco, health, energy, public sector, tech
* Experience speaking at conferences or industry events


 What we offer you
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance when shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven commission structure. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Program
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Canonical has been a fully distributed company since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Senior Data Scientist, Marketing Analytics
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

**About The Team**
 In the Marketing Analytics team we are focused on improving the effectiveness of our marketing spend and help grow Wolt. We solve a variety of marketing challenges and help optimise Wolt’s marketing mix through attribution, MMM and Experimentation, enabling effective measurement of different marketing initiatives and working with the marketing team to identify areas for improvement and growth across all Wolt countries. Considering the scale of Wolt’s marketing function, there are many exciting problems to be solved and plenty of opportunities to make a business impact.
   

  

 Data Scientists at Wolt work to uncover insights and turn them into relevant recommendations, driving decisions for the entire organisation. We partner closely with Marketing, Product, Engineering and Strategy & Operations teams to guide measurement and tactical decision-making using advanced analytics as we expand the Wolt platform across the globe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision making. This is a rare, operational and actionable data-driven experience. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics role.
   

  

 If you enjoy finding patterns amidst chaos, are excited to build from 0 to 1, and have experience using analytics and data science skills to drive business outcomes, we're looking for someone like you.
   

  

 What you’ll be doing
   

  

* Use statistical techniques, hypothesis testing, and experimentation to validate findings and drive business outcomes
* Provide insights on marketplace dynamics, user behaviors, and long-term trends to our business
* Conduct quantitative analysis and present data to uncover business drivers and insights beyond the numbers
* Build analytics experiments, reports, and dashboards; perform ad-hoc data analyses using tools like SQL, R, or Python
* Identify and measure levers to enhance metrics; make actionable recommendations
* Offer clarity in ambiguous environments and collaborate across multiple teams and collaborate effectively across teams, including Marketing, Strategy & Operations, Product, Finance, and Engineering.
* Mentor team members towards achieving actionable outcomes


 Our humble expectations
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in data analytics, consulting, or related quantitative field
* Skills in SQL queries, predictive modeling, and using visualization tools such as Looker or Tableau; experience with Python or R is a plus
* Proficiency in experimentation techniques, including causal inference and A/B testing, with experience in experiment design and statistical analysis, with the ability to define success metrics and implement measurement strategies
* A creative and critical mindset, thriving in fast-paced, dynamic environments to resolve ambiguous problems using a structured, hypothesis-driven, and data-supported approach
* Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to work cross-functionally and influence both technical and non-technical audiences and ability to lead strategic projects to completion with cross-functional teams in scrappy environments
* Humility and a team-player attitude, going out of your way to help teammates
* Familiarity with multi-sided marketplaces and working experience in marketing are a plus


 What we offer
   

  

* The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
* You can work onsite at our offices in Helsinki, Stockholm, or Tallinn. Alternatively, you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, or Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote, within the location above. 💙
* You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement.


 Next steps
   

  

 The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!
   

  

 For any further questions about the position, you can turn to the Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Test Manager - Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Vi fortsätter att växa och söker nu en testledare för spännande konsultuppdrag. Har du stort intresse för test och kvalitetssäkring, gillar konsultrollen och omväxling och tycker det är kul att vara med i ett team där vi aktivt delar med oss av kunskaper inom våra kompetensområden? Bli en av oss!
   

  

 Tietoevry Tech Services är i en påbörjad spännande resa under nytt ägandeksap. Denna förändring öppnar upp för nya möjligheter, utmaningar och tillväxtmöjligheter för vårt företag och våra anställda. Vi söker efter talangfulla personer som vill följa med oss på denna spännande resa och hjälpa till att forma den digitala landskapet i Norden.
   

  

**Mer Om Oss**
 Vårt testing community på Tietoevry Tech Services arbetar med kvalitetssäkring i alla typer av branscher. Vi är drygt 1000 anställda spridda runt om i världen. Som konsult hos oss kommer du växla mellan att sitta ute hos kund och arbeta i deras interna projekt och att ingå i någon av våra helhetsåtaganden där leveransteamen ofta jobbar inom Agilia metoder och DevOps med automatiserade testprocesser.
   

  

**Dina Arbetsuppgifter Består Huvudsakligen Av**
* Framtagning och implementering av teststrategi som inkluderar en beskrivning av alla testtyper och testnivåer för det specifika testobjekt eller uppdraget
* Planering och ledning av alla testaktiviteter som skall genomföras inom det område som ska testas t.ex Systemtest, Systemintegrationstest och Acceptanstest
* Tid och resursestimering samt säkring av alla resurser som behövs för att kunna genomföra uppdraget
* Planering och säkerställandet av alla testmiljöer och testdata som behövs för att kunna genomföra de planerade testerna.
* Att vara ansvaring för felhantering, statusrapportering och riskhantering
* Att vara ansvaring för slutlig testutvärdering och rapportering
* Att ha nära samarbete med produktägare, Projektledare, Arkitekt och andra intressenter


**Vem söker vi?** 
  

  

* Du har relevant eftergymnasialutbildning, eller motsvarande
* Du har mycket god erfarenhet av testning och/eller testledning (5 år+ som testledare, eller motsvarande)
* Du är svensk medborgare samt flytande i svenska och engelska språket
* Certifiering (ISTQB Foundation level eller högre/liknande) och Scrum Master alternativt motsvarande
* Kunskap inom olika typer av teststrategier, testplanering och ledning av testteam
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt och metoder såsom Scrum, eller SAFe och testmetoder, t.ex. Exploratory Testing, Session Based Test Management (SBTM), Test driven, Driven Development (TDD), agila testkvadranterna
* Erfarenhet att driva tester i olika verktyg t ex JIRA med Test plug-in, HP ALM, TFS, ReQtest eller liknande
* Kunskaper i utvecklingsprocesser, testprocesser, automation och närliggande områden såsom t.ex. krav- och felhanteringsprocesser


**Det Är Meriterande Om Du Också Har**
* Kunskaper inom Continuous Integration Testing
* Tidigare arbetat inom telecom, finansiella branschen eller offentlig sektor


 Eftersom du kommer att jobba nära våra kunder i konsultuppdrag tror vi tror att du som person är utåtriktad, driven, strukturerad, ansvarsfull, noggrann med god ledarförmåga.
   

  

 Du är flexibel och gillar att arbeta i en roll där tempot är högt och där arbetsuppgifterna snabbt kan förändras. Vi tror också att du uppskattar att arbeta i team och att du gärna delar med dig av dina kunskaper samtidigt som du också kan arbeta självständigt och fokuserat när så krävs.
   

  

 För att trivas hos oss bör du dessutom ha en affärsmässig inställning, ett stort eget driv och gilla utmaningar.
   

  

**Vi Erbjuder Dig**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Vi erbjuder dig en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del för att du ska bli framgångsrik. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och konstant lärande som en livsstil där du behöver skola om dig varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.
   

  

**Fick vi dig inspirerad?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta anställande chef, Saeid Mojtahedzadeh, saeid.mojtahedzadeh@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hoppas vi hörs snart!
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*
*Tietoevry tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*
*Tietoevry värdesätter mångfald och vi välkomnar sökande av alla kön, åldrar, förmågor, etniciteter, inriktningar, övertygelser och bakgrunder.*
**Om Tietoevry Tech Services**
 På Tietoevry Tech Services specialiserar vi oss på att driva digital transformation. Vår expertis ligger i att hjälpa nordiska verksamheter och bolag genom att modernisera och utveckla processer, applikationer och infrastruktur, samt tillhandahålla pålitliga, säkra och effektiva IT-tjänster. Under nytt ägandeskap kommer vi att fortsätta forma framtiden för teknologi i Norden tillsammans med våra kunder.
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Konsult inom Enterprise Service Management (ESM) - Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Vi söker en
 **Enterprise Service Management (ESM) konsult** 
 till vårt växande team på Tietoevry Tech Services! I denna roll kommer du leda omvandlingen
 **av IT och hantering av affärstjänster** 
 för våra kunder, driva
 **innovation, automatisering och mätbart värde** 
 .
   

  

 Du kommer att samarbeta med företagskunder för att
 **modernisera deras tjänstehanteringslandskap** 
 – vilket säkerställer sömlös drift, förbättrad användarupplevelse och betydande kostnadsbesparingar genom processoptimering och avancerade ESM-plattformar.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga Ansvarsområden**
* Konsultera och ge råd till kunder om strategier, bästa praxis och färdplaner för omvandling av företagstjänster.
* Leda utvärderingar av servicehantering, gapanalys och mognadsförbättringar i linje med affärsmålen.
* Designa och implementera innovativa service management-lösningar med fokus på automation, AI och självbetjäning.
* Leverera och optimera SIAM-modeller (Multi-Provider Service Integration) för att förbättra styrning, ansvar och prestanda.
* Konfigurera, anpassa och distribuera ledande ESM-verktyg som ServiceNow, Jira Service Management, Freshdesk och andra.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team (IT, affärer, leverantörer) för att driva kontinuerlig serviceförbättring (CSI).
* Underlätta workshops och utbildningssessioner för att bädda in bästa praxis i kundorganisationer.
* Spåra, mät och rapportera om mätvärden och KPI:er för serviceprestanda.
* Håll dig uppdaterad med nya trender inom ESM-, SIAM- och ITSM-ramverk för att ge innovativa idéer till kunderna.


**Vem Vi Söker**
* Du har flera års erfarenhet av IT Service Management, Enterprise Service Management eller SIAM-konsulting.
* Djup kunskap och praktisk erfarenhet av ITIL-processer (Incident, Problem, Change, Service Request, Asset & Config, Knowledge, SLM, etc.).
* Stark expertis inom Service Integration & Management (SIAM) principer och leveransmodeller.
* Beprövad erfarenhet av ESM/ITSM-verktyg som:
+ ServiceNow
+ Jira Tjänstehantering
+ Freshdesk
+ BMC Remedy eller liknande plattformar

* Gedigen förståelse för automatisering och AI-integration inom service management-processer.
* Stark problemlösningsförmåga med förmåga att tänka strategiskt och genomföra taktiskt.
* Utmärkt förmåga att kommunicera, presentera och hantera intressenter.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i en teammiljö med både tekniska och affärsteam.
* Svenska språket är är ett krav, norska är ett plus.


**Certifieringar**
* SIAM Professional-certifiering (Ett måste/måste erhållas inom det första året).
* ITIL 4-certifiering (krav).
* ISO/IEC 20000- eller ISO 4001-certifiering (AI Management) (Meriterande).
* Ytterligare certifieringar i ServiceNow, Jira eller andra ESM-verktyg (Meriterande).


**Vi Erbjuder Dig**
* En dynamisk och innovativ miljö med fokus på banbrytande omvandling av servicehantering.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med ledande företag inom olika branscher.
* Tillgång till kontinuerligt lärande, certifieringar och karriärutvecklingsmöjligheter .
* En samarbetskultur där dina idéer och bidrag värderas.

 Vi erbjuder dig också professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv!  ger organisationer möjlighet att låsa upp effektivitetsvinster, minska kostnaderna och förbättra serviceupplevelserna genom smart integration, AI och automatisering.
